attributes.title: THIS APP IS AWFUL!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD

I whole heartedly feel that this website was attacking me on a personal level. it was extremely non inclusive and discriminatory for no reason. It is my firm belief that this wretched app should be taken down for its violation of community guidelines.
